mapper.insert: insert into ACCEPT (PID, AID, DID, WID, STAT, NOTE, TIM, TEL, PER, NOE, WORK, RES) values (#{pid,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{aid,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{did,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{wid,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{stat,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{note,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{tim,jdbcType=DATE}, #{tel,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{per,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{noe,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{work,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{res,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
mapper.update: update ACCEPT set AID = #{aid,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, DID = #{did,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, WID = #{wid,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, STAT = #{stat,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, NOTE = #{note,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, TIM = #{tim,jdbcType=DATE}, TEL = #{tel,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PER = #{per,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, NOE = #{noe,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, WORK = #{work,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, RES = #{res,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where PID = #{pid,jdbcType=DECIMAL}
mapper.select: select PID, AID, DID, WID, STAT, NOTE, TIM, TEL, PER, NOE, WORK, RES from ACCEPT
